name: unsystematized
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
not arranged according to an organized system: After a head injury, the patient may experience hallucinations and unsystematized delusions. Creating this type of life plan is a way of understanding and framing your choices, given how messy and unsystematised the world has become. Related word
systematize
More examplesFewer examplesThe company's system for giving bonuses is totally unsystematized: it involves awarding a substantial amount of money at any time for a task that has been especially well done. This field, rich with unsystematised stores of knowledge, has been neglected by naturalists.His approach involved frequent and popular preaching, unconventional prayer, and unsystematized private devotion.
